name: Henchmen Hustle: Stay Dry or Die
name_original: Henchmen Hustle: Stay Dry or Die
description:
[WARNING: mild violence]

Escape: Exit F: Full Screen

HOW TO PLAY

Click on puddles and then the henchman (or vice versa) to have them protect the boss. To open the umbrella, click on the boss and then a henchman to have them come forward.
